testcase.name: testCorrrectPotionsClass
testcase.system-out:
You have chosen to attend Potions class. Your teacher is Professor Snape. This class will use your intelligence stat.
You have been given a potion to brew. You must follow the instructions carefully to brew the potion correctly.
In order to brew the potions correctly you must correctly type the following words within the allotted time frame. If you do not type the words correctly within the time frame you will fail the potion and not gain any benefits for the day.
Are you ready to begin (yes/no)
Great let's get started!
wingardium
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
leviosa
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
alohomora
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient

Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
lumos
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
nox
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
accio
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
expecto
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
patronum
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
stupefy
Correct! You have successfully typed the ingredient
Congratulations! You have successfully brewed the potion. You will gain a bonus of +1 to your intelligence stat for the day.
